sentences.sentence: She leaned forward to scrutinize their faces.
sentences.translation: 她探身向前，端详他们的面容。

sentences.sentence: Her purpose was to scrutinize his features to see if he was an honest man.
sentences.translation: 她的目的是仔细察看他的特征看他是不是个诚实的人。

sentences.sentence: As boards scrutinize succession plans in response to shareholder pressure, executives who don't get the nod also may wish to move on.
sentences.translation: 由于董事会迫于股东们的压力而严格审查公司的接任方案，那些未获得许可的高管们也可能会想辞职。
